version_description:
HUGE FIRST UPDATE !!

* Level up! Earn XP and get rewards for playing!
* More than 80 new, Premium skins to use with any nickname!
* Get Boosts to kick-start your progress!
* See your performance & stats after every game!
* Share your best results with your friends! 
* Lots of other fixes and improvements!

Get EATING !!

HUGE FIRST UPDATE !!

* Level up! Earn XP and get rewards for playing!
* More than 80 new, Premium skins to use with any nickname!
* Get Boosts to kick-start your progress!
* See your performance & stats after every game!
* Share your best results with your friends! 
* Lots of other fixes and improvements!

Get EATING !!

* More than 80 new, Premium skins to use with any nickname!

* Lots of other fixes and improvements!

Get EATING !!

* Show off your skills: Unlock all-new VETERAN SKINS for free as you Level up!
* New, exclusive CHRISTMAS SKINS!
* Bug fixes and performance improvements

* Fixes connectivity issues

* New “Rush mode” available. Compete to grow the biggest in a 5 minute feeding frenzy!
* New Daily Quests! Achieve the objective to claim prizes every day.
* Now available translated into French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian and Turkish!
* Bug fixes and performance improvements

* We are aware of all issues in the arena - the main ones were cells and skins that disappeared, lost control when your cell split - but this last update should fix them; in case you continue to have these issues please report with as much detail as possible to help us solve it
* Improved a lot the login system in order to prevent all connectivity issues
* Performance improvements and bug fixing

* Introducing Agar.io Beta Season, arriving 18 November 2019
   - Collect star tokens in any arena and in potions to unlock rewards galore
   - Buy the Golden Pass to take Star Season to the next level for super exclusive rewards and skins
* Arena performance improvements and bug fixing

* Introducing Agar.io Christmas Season, arriving 20 December 2019
   - Collect candy cane tokens in any arena and in potions to unlock rewards galore
   - Buy the Golden Pass to take Christmas Season to the next level for super exclusive rewards and skins
* Guess what’s in game for all? Macro is here to stay. Macro is a special fast-eject function you can access by long holding on eject 
* Arena performance improvements and bug fixing

* Introducing Agar.io Beta Season, arriving 18 November 2019
   - Collect star tokens in any arena and in potions to unlock rewards galore
   - Buy the Golden Pass to take Star Season to the next level for super exclusive rewards and skins
* Arena performance improvements and bug fixing

* Introducing Agar.io Christmas Season, arriving 20 December 2019
   - Collect candy cane tokens in any arena and in potions to unlock rewards galore
   - Buy the Golden Pass to take Christmas Season to the next level for super exclusive rewards and skins
* Guess what’s in game for all? Macro is here to stay. Macro is a special fast-eject function you can access by long holding on eject 
* Arena performance improvements and bug fixing

* Introducing Agar.io Chinese New Year Season, arriving 21 January 2020
   - Collect rat tokens in any arena and in potions to unlock rewards galore
   - Buy the Golden Pass to take Chinese New Year Season to the next level for super exclusive rewards and skins
* Arena performance improvements and bug fixing

- New event coming up - check in on the 7th of April because something new will happen in our arenas; we have a surprise ready for you!
- Fixed rush boost issue when purchasing boosts in the lobby screen
- Added Discord button to settings menu - connect with friends and fans from all around the world on the Agar.io Discord Server
- Support iPad 2019 7th generation

- New event coming up - check in on the 7th of April because something new will happen in our arenas; we have a surprise ready for you!
- Fixed rush boost issue when purchasing boosts in the lobby screen
- Added Discord button to settings menu - connect with friends and fans from all around the world on the Agar.io Discord Server
- Support iPad 2019 7th generation

* Introducing Agar.io 5 de Mayo Season, arriving 1 May 2020
   - Collect tokens in any arena and in potions to unlock rewards galore
   - Buy the Golden Pass to take 5 de Mayo Season to the next level for super exclusive rewards and skins

- Hourly free coins now available for guest accounts
- Ejected pellets will now have the same color as your skin outline

- Hourly free coins now available for guest accounts

* New event coming up - 29th of July
     - Something new will happen in our arenas, we have a surprise ready for you

* Fixed respawn issue in rush mode

* Play with friends around the world with the all-new region selector
* Switch nickname and skin visuals on and off with new setting controls

* It’s time to explore in Agar.io Adventure, new feature arriving 15 December 2020:
    - Collect special tokens in any arena and use them to explore Winter Land. So many paths, so many rewards
    - Buy the Golden Road to unlock even more exclusive rewards and super exclusive skins
* Fixed emoji issue

* It’s time to explore in Agar.io Adventure arriving 26 January 2021:
    - Collect special tokens in any arena and use them to explore Treasure Island. So many paths, so many rewards.
    - Buy the Golden Road to unlock even more exclusive rewards and super exclusive skins.
* Support latest iPhone devices

* It’s time to explore in Agar.io Adventure arriving 26 January 2021:
    - Collect special tokens in any arena and use them to explore Treasure Island. So many paths, so many rewards.
    - Buy the Golden Road to unlock even more exclusive rewards and super exclusive skins.
* Support latest iPhone devices

*  Introducing Jungle Quest Adventure, arriving 12 March 2021
     - Collect gem tokens in any arena and in potions to unlock rewards galore 
     - Buy the Golden Road to take your Agar.io Adventure to the next level for super exclusive rewards and skins
    
* New Adventure features:
     - Get new exclusive skin by collecting enough rewards
     - Tap on the reward to collect it
     - Watch videos to get free tokens and explore the maze

* Watch video to get free mass boost when entering classic mode

     - Tap on the reward to collect it

* Introducing 5 de Mayo Adventure, arriving 30 April 2021
     - Collect chilli pepper tokens in any arena and in potions to unlock rewards galore 
     - Buy the Golden Road to take your Agar.io Adventure to the next level for super exclusive rewards and skins

* Introducing Orangutan Season, arriving 7 August 2021 
   - Collect banana tokens in any arena and in potions to unlock rewards galore
   - Buy the Golden Pass to take Orangutan Season to the next level for super exclusive rewards and skins

* Custom Skin loop issue fixed

   - Buy the Golden Pass to take Halloween Adventure to the next level for super exclusive rewards and skins

* Presenting Emojis - NOW available in any arena
* Get a FREE potion every day by watching a video
* Open potions faster by watching a video

   - Buy the Golden Pass to take Cyber Season to the next level for super exclusive rewards and skins
